name: Brick-Break Remake
description:
Inspired by nostalgia! Brick-Break Remake is a Unity project I am working on while learning the fundamentals of using Unity.

Break the bricks and top your high score! Easy to learn, a blast to play!

This early protoype is the foundation of what may become a more polished and modern take on that old arcade classic! Follow along the development and see where it goes.

Controls:

Move Left    -    'W' or 'Left Arrow'

Move Right  -   'D' or 'Right Arrow'
